material: solid cast iron with vinyl coating and black paint finish
usage: Strength and conditioning workouts using kettlebell exercises at the gym or home, including swings, squats, lunges, presses, rows and similar movements.
key_features: Material: cast iron full solid vinyl coated
Top-quality solid cast iron material constructed with no welds, weak spots, or seams
Black paint finish to help prevent corrosion, increase durability, and improve grip
Covered with soft durable vinyl material to protect the floor and provide anti-corrosion
Wide textured handle for a comfortable and secure grip
Weight markings printed on the kettlebell
Inner core pure iron casting for high strength and long service life
Lead free coating with REACH compliance
Give your body a total toning and strengthening workout
Supports exercises such as front squats, swings, walking lunges, two-arm rows
Supports exercises such as two handed kettlebell swing, clean and press, squat, high pull, lunge, snatch
ai_description: A solid cast-iron kettlebell with a glossy black body and textured grey handle, clearly marked “KAKSS 20 KG” on the front. Other images show green and blue vinyl-coated versions, flat bottoms, wide handles, and infographics highlighting non-toxic, smell-proof coating and exercise examples.
target_audience: People doing gym or home workouts who want strength, toning and conditioning equipment, including fitness enthusiasts and athletes.
product_name: Kakss Vinyl Half Coating Kettle Bell for Gym & Workout
